Author: theworldismadeofcorn
Text: For what it's worth, I had health issues from restricting even at a "normal" BMI. The physical issues didn't go away until I consistently ate enough food for a month or so and the intrusive ED thoughts have lessened.

Author: vitaminsplz
Text: To be fair, if you're UW, putting on some weight is important because if you get really sick, an UW person would be without some fat reserves to help them not die of starvation.   That was the explaination my docs gave me, anyway.   Note: i have GI issues that cause me to not be able to eat for a few days so that might just be situational knowledge that they gave me
